meanings.definition: To work together in a cooperative effort.
meanings.sent1: The team members synergise to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent2: The students synergise to clean up the classroom after school.
meanings.sent3: The ants synergise to carry a large piece of food back to their nest.
meanings.sent4: The dancers synergise their movements to create a beautiful performance.
meanings.sent5: The musicians synergise their instruments to produce a harmonious melody.

meanings.definition: To combine efforts or resources to produce a greater effect than working separately.
meanings.sent1: The companies synergise their expertise to develop innovative products.
meanings.sent2: The athletes synergise their skills to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The chefs synergise their recipes to create a unique dish.
meanings.sent4: The artists synergise their styles to create a masterpiece.
meanings.sent5: The volunteers synergise their efforts to help those in need.
